local_intent: Align tool, set yaw 90, push the T-block 0.2m along direction 0°, then retreat and pause.
assumptions: direction_deg 0 aligns with desired push axis; yaw 90 is correct for the contact geometry
coherence_with_global: Matches perceive→align→set yaw→push→retreat sequence in GLOBAL_BT and push-focused transfer phase.
